item.title: Overcoming the Challenges of Answer Search Engines
item.description: The Generative Pre-trained Transformers (GPT) family of large language models has been rapidly improving. These language models are trained on data that humankind has produced, giving us access to the collective wisdom of the ages, but faster and more accurately. GPT-3, released in mid-2020, was a breakthrough and has enabled a range of text-based projects of varying complexity. The release of ChatGPT in late 2022 has further pushed the boundaries, although AI still has some limitations.

item.title: Ageing Population Opportunities
item.description: The human populace has multiplied exponentially — from 1 billion to 8 billion within two centuries. From 1960, the rise became swift — population has augmented by one billion every 10-15 years, largely due to dropping infant mortality rates. By the mid-21st century, it is expected to reach 10 billion. Because of that, in the 20th century, governments have been alarmed, believing that growth needs to be reduced to ensure enough food and living space for everyone.

item.title: How To Make Smart Assistant Smarter And Stay Private?
item.description: I was inspired by this thread of comments and came to some conclusions around future of virtual assistants — https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=33608437 I am passionate about the idea of intelligent virtual assistant, like many people around here. This widespread obsession is visible through countless examples from popular culture — HAL 9000 and Jarvis, Skynet and Batcomputer. What’s so attractive about it? Virtual assistant represent the companion, who’s power complement human’s, and help one to become a superhuman, with limitless capabilities.

item.title: What Data Do We Lose Now?
item.description: What data do we gather? We gather a vast amount of data — the total amount gathered up to 2020 is 64,2 zettabytes, and till 2025 it will reach 180 zettabytes. There are some of the fields: Users behavior online. We get from search, socials, communication platforms, e-com stores, payment providers. It gives information about what our society is looking for, what we are capturing, and how we behave in the real-time.

item.title: How to gain muscle mass on a vegan diet?
item.description: For more than 2 years I train regularly, trying not to skip working out. I see progress, but it does not match invested efforts. One of the factors that may impact my workout performance significantly is my diet. And I am not sure, that my nutrition is balanced with my goals. What goals do I have? My goal is to maintain a high overall level of health, to live longer, maintain advanced energy and focus, strength, mobility and flexibility.

item.title: App Marketing predictions using MMM
item.description: Disclaimer: I am not a statistician. I always worked with app marketing. I wrote this text for people like me — for who don’t know much about linear regression and stuff. Some of these techniques I tried, most of them not. But I wanna to explore it to answer some questions. What is MMM? Marketing Mix Modeling is an analysis of historical marketing data to estimate the impact of marketing channels and activities on sales and forecast the future.

item.title: Muscular flexibility is underrated. Why?
item.description: I am not flexible. I can’t even touch my toes. A few years ago I had back pain. Manual therapist said that I have weak back muscles, and this will impact my future life. He even advised me not to lift weights heavier than 5 kg. Now I am recovered, but sometimes it reminds me of itself. I wondered — now I am in my late 20s. I can’t touch my toes, sometimes I have unbearable pain when I can’t roll out of bed.
